title: Snitch Cluster Schema
description: Base description of a Snitch cluster and its internal structure and configuration.

name.description: Optional name for the generated wrapper.

boot_addr.description: Address from which all harts of the cluster start to boot. The default setting is `0x8000_0000`.

tcdm.description: Configuration of the Tightly Coupled Data Memory of this cluster.

size.description: Size of TCDM in KiByte. Divided in `n` banks. The total size must be divisible by the number of banks.

addr_width.description: Length of the address, should be greater than 30. If the address is larger than 34 the data bus needs to be 64 bits in size.

data_width.description: Data bus size of the integer core (everything except the DMA), must be 32 or 64. A double precision FPU requires 64 bit data length.

dma_data_width.description: Data bus size of DMA. Usually this is larger than the integer core as the DMA is used to efficiently transfer bulk of data.

id_width_in.description: Id width of the narrower AXI plug into the cluster.

dma_id_width_in.description: Id width of the wide AXI plug into the cluster.

hart_base_id.description: Base hart id of the cluster. All cores get the respective cluster id plus their cluster position as the final `hart_id`.

mode.description: Supported mode by the processor, can be msu.

vm.description: Supported virtual memory mode, can be XSv32.

dma_axi_req_fifo_depth.description: Number of AXI FIFO entries of the DMA engine.

dma_req_fifo_depth.description: Number of request entries the DMA can keep

sram_cfg_expose.description: Whether to expose memory cut configuration inputs for implementation

sram_cfg_fields.description: The names and widths of memory cut configuration inputs needed for implementation

iso_crossings.description: Enable isochronous crossings, this clocks the integer core at half the speed of the rest of the system.

narrow_xbar_latency.description: Latency mode of the cluster crossbar.

wide_xbar_latency.description: Latency mode of the DMA crossbar.

register_offload_req.description: Insert Pipeline registers into off-loading path (request).

register_offload_rsp.description: Insert Pipeline registers into off-loading path (response).

register_core_req.description: Insert Pipeline registers into data memory request path.

register_core_rsp.description: Insert Pipeline registers into data memory response path.

register_fpu_req.description: Insert Pipeline register into the FPU request data path

register_tcdm_cuts.description: Insert Pipeline registers after each memory cut.

lat_comp_fp32.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP32.

lat_comp_fp64.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP64.

lat_comp_fp16.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP16.

lat_comp_fp16_alt.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP16alt (brainfloat).

lat_comp_fp8.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP8.

lat_comp_fp8alt.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for FP8alt.

lat_noncomp.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for floating-point non-computational instructions (except conversions), i.e., `classify`, etc.

lat_conv.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for floating-point conversion instructions.

lat_sdotp.description: Latency setting (number of pipeline stages) for floating-point expanding dot product with accumulation.

fpu_pipe_config.description: Pipeline configuration (i.e., position of the registers) of the FPU.

hives.title: Hives
hives.description: Cores in a hive share an instruction cache and other shared infrastructure such as the PTW or the multiply/divide unit.

icache.title: Hive's instruction cache configuration.
icache.description: Detailed configuration of the current Hive's instruction cache.

size.description: Total instruction cache size in KiByte.

cores.title: Cores
cores.description: List of all cores in the respective hive.

isa.title: ISA String containing RISC-V standard extensions.
isa.description: ISA string as defined by the RISC-V standard. Only contain the standardized ISA extensions.

Xdiv_sqrt.description: Enable hardware support for floating-point division and square-root. The iterative floating-point unit is known to produce some rounding inaccuracies so it is disabled by default.

xf16alt.title: Xf16alt 16-bit Brain-Float Extension
xf16alt.description: Enable Smallfloat Xf16alt extension, also known as brain-float.

num_int_outstanding_loads.description: Number of outstanding integer loads. Determines the buffer size in the core's load/store unit.

num_int_outstanding_mem.description: Number of outstanding memory operations. Determines the buffer size in the core's load/store unit.

num_fp_outstanding_loads.description: Number of outstanding floating-point loads. Determines the buffer size in the FPU's load/store unit.

num_fp_outstanding_mem.description: Number of outstanding memory operations. Determines the buffer size in the core's load/store unit.

num_sequencer_instructions.description: Amount of floating-point instruction the floating-point sequence buffer can hold.

num_itlb_entries.description: Number of ITLB entries. Determines the core's size.

num_dtlb_entries.description: Number of DTLB entries. Determines the core's size.

ssr_intersection.title: SSR Intersection Feature
ssr_intersection.description: Enable intersection between 3 SSRs for sparse-sparse processing.

ssr_intersection_triple.title: SSR Intersection Triple
ssr_intersection_triple.description: Indices of the SSRs forming an SSR intersection triple.

ssr_mux_resp_depth.description: Depth of response buffer in the TCDM multiplexer arbitrating between core and SSR 0.

ssrs.title: SSRs
ssrs.description: List of all SSRs in the respective core.

items.title: SSR Description
items.description: Description of a single Stream Semantic Register.

reg_idx.description: The floating-point register index this SSR is assigned to. If not assigned, the next available index counting from 0 is chosen.

indir_out_spill.description: Whether to cut timing paths with a spill register at the address generator output; added only if indirection extension enabled.

isect_slave_spill.description: Whether to cut timing paths with a spill register at the intersector index output; added only if this SSR is an intersection slave.

isect_slave_credits.description: Number of elements by which intersected indices may outrun corresponding data; added only if this SSR is an intersection slave.

num_loops.description: Number of nested hardware loops in address generator.

index_credits.description: Number of credits and buffer depth of the index word FIFO.

data_credits.description: Number of credits and buffer depth of the data word FIFO.

mux_resp_depth.description: Depth of response buffer in the TCDM multiplexer arbitrating between data and indices.

index_width.description: Internal bitwidth of indices in address generator.

pointer_width.description: Internal bitwidth of pointers in address generator; must be larger than the TCDM word address mask.

shift_width.description: Internal bitwidth of additional left shift amount for indirect indices.

rpt_width.description: Internal bitwidth of repetition counter for read streams.
